description: An uncharted island in the Paradise section of the Grand Line, inhabited only by an elderly man named Zenny and a large population of goats. The island features mountainous terrain where Zenny built his pirate ship over 20 years.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Help Repair Zenny's Ship
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat crew works together on Goat Island to repair Zenny's mountain-top ship, with various members contributing their skills.
keyEvents.significance: The island serves as a peaceful refuge where the Straw Hats can help someone pursue their dream despite being pursued by Marines.

keyEvents.title: Zenny's Past on the Island Revealed
keyEvents.description: Zenny explains how he drifted to this island 20 years ago after his ship was destroyed by pirates, and how he built his new ship on the mountain.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals the history of the island and why Zenny has been stranded there for two decades.

keyEvents.title: Marine Fleet Arrives
keyEvents.description: Sergeant Minchey and a Marine fleet arrive at Goat Island, claiming to inspect the island but actually planning to ambush the Straw Hats.
keyEvents.significance: Transforms the peaceful island into a battleground between the Straw Hats and the Marines.

statusHistory.reason: Island continues to be inhabited by Zenny and the goats
